task.title: Improve duplicate broker startup error reporting

events.content: Classify duplicate-broker startup errors and print remediation: Classify duplicate-broker startup errors and print remediation

raw.question: Classify duplicate-broker startup errors and print remediation
raw.chosen: Classify duplicate-broker startup errors and print remediation
raw.reasoning: Users should see actionable guidance (status/down/force) instead of a raw process exit code when lock conflicts happen

retrospective.summary: Added actionable duplicate-broker startup errors with remediation, plus tests and live verification
